name: Ayotha: Story of Merchant
description:
In this version of the game, it is still in the alpha phase, there may be changes from the original, the player character will have a different skin or behavior  and no skills have been used yet. The NPC will have to adjust the personality to match the balance in In the future, and some NPCs still cannot talk, such as teleporting or collecting various items, the dialogue will change from before. Because currently it is just talking to get the quest May not have access to much of the story. Finally, it is still in the testing phase, and we ask that all players. Please read before playing the game.

What is in the testing phase is as follows.
- 4 map
- 3 types of monsters
- Player 1
- Npc quest 3
- Npc 5
- Npc teleport 1

With respect from the team, Thankful for you supported.

''.. If a game has full version is complete, We'll send to you.

Of course, there are no additional costs.''
